text: Sprite animation showing a man with skin of reddish-orange color that is dancing, composed of 8 slightly different frames, each frame has size of 128x128 pixels, front view, character has half-shaven gray hair, dark green pants, yellow eyes, white shoes, blue shirt, sprite sequence is centered, with the solid azure background.
